data.title: The Best Pop Punk Wedding Songs Playlist
images: https://cdn.tailored-entertainment.com/images/blogs/Pop Punk Wedding groom and bride with skateboards_1709717061.jpg?version=604.1
data.meta_description: Rock your wedding with the best Pop Punk Playlist! From lively prelude tunes to a rebellious finale, this collection promises a high-energy vibe.
data.text:
Pop Punk Wedding Prelude Songs for Your Guests Arrival

Welcome your guests with the upbeat tunes of these pop-punk songs. Set the stage for a celebration that's anything but ordinary!

"All the Small Things" - Blink-182

"Check Yes Juliet" - We the Kings

"I Write Sins Not Tragedies" - Panic! At The Disco

"The Anthem" - Good Charlotte

"Weightless" - All Time Low

Getting Ready Pop Punk Song Wedding Playlist

Getting ready for the big day calls for an adrenaline-pumping pop-punk playlist to build excitement. Fist-pumping anthems like...

"Going Out In Style" by Dropkick Murphys,

"Get Ready" by Simple Plan,

"Ready Steady Go" by L'Arc~en~Ciel make for an energetic soundtrack while prepping.

"Getting' Ready" by Blink-182

"Primadonna" by Marina and The Diamonds.

Pop Punk Power Songs for the Wedding Ceremony:

Feel the power of love with these Wedding Pop Punk Songs

- "Sugar, We're Goin Down" - Fall Out Boy

- "A Part of Me" - Neck Deep

- "I Will Follow You Into the Dark" - Death Cab for Cutie (Covered by Plain White T's)

- "All I Want" - A Day to Remember

- "Thnks fr th Mmrs" - Fall Out Boy

Pop Punk Wedding Vow Exchange Songs

These tracks will work well for the vow exchange portion of the ceremony. They have catchy yet emotional melodies with romantic, meaningful lyrics fitting for professing your pop-punk love.

"First Date" by blink-182

"She's So High" by Tal Bachman

"Punk Rock Princess" by Something Corporate

"Iris" by Goo Goo Dolls

Exchange Your Rings To These Pop Punk Wedding Songs

These melodic yet heavy-hitting tracks capture the deep commitment and meaning behind exchanging rings. The powerful riffs and driving rhythms evoke the solemnity of the occasion, while the soaring vocals express the soaring emotions felt by the couple. Many draw metaphors from metal itself - forged in fire, unbreakable, eternal.

"Promise Ring" by Lamb of God

"Circle" by Baroness

"Endless Forms Most Beautiful" by Nightwish

"Wedding Ring" by HIM

"Married to Metal" by Destrier

Uplifting Pop Punk Wedding Exit Songs:

Bid farewell to your wedding ceremony with these timeless Pop Punk classics

- "I Wanna Dance with Somebody" - Fall Out Boy (Cover of Whitney Houston)

- "Hey There Delilah" - Plain White T's

- "Basket Case" - Green Day

- "Shut Up and Dance" - WALK THE MOON (Pop Punk cover)

Pop Punk Recessional Weddings Songs

These upbeat anthemic tracks would make a fun, celebratory exit for the newlywed couple during the recessional. The driving guitars, catchy hooks, and high-energy vibe set an exciting tone as the couple makes their grand exit.

Here are 5 great pop punk song options for the recessional at a pop punk-themed wedding:

"Welcome to the Black Parade" by My Chemical Romance

"Stacy's Mom" by Fountains of Wayne

"That's What You Get" by Paramore

"Jesse's Girl" by Rick Springfield (covered by Bowling For Soup)

Pop Punk Songs for the Wedding After Party

Take the celebration to the next level with these pop-punk songs

- "Dance, Dance" - Fall Out Boy

- "All Star" - Smash Mouth

- "Don't Stop Believin'" - Journey (Covered by New Found Glory)

- "Dancing with Myself" - Billy Idol

- "Fat Lip" - Sum 41

Reception pop punk wedding dance songs

These upbeat tracks would get guests of all ages on the dance floor celebrating the newlyweds. The driving beats and singalong choruses create an energetic, fun atmosphere perfect for a pop-punk reception. Many of these bands put their own spin on popular songs to give them a pop-punk flair.

"Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous" by Good Charlotte

"Move Along" by The All-American Rejects

"Shut Up and Dance" by Walk The Moon

Toss your Bouquet to these best pop-punk wedding songs

The bouquet toss is a longstanding wedding tradition meant to predict who'll be the next to get married. You'll want pop-punk hits with a playful, flirty vibe to go along with the pageantry like....

"Misery Business" by Paramore,

"Girlfriend" by Avril Lavigne,

"Singles" by The Freshkills.

"Weightless" by All Time Low match the energy perfectly.

Pop Punk songs for Your wedding Father-Daughter Dance:

While pop punk may not be the first genre that comes to mind for father/daughter dances at weddings, these upbeat yet meaningful songs from beloved pop punk bands are perfect for making lasting memories with your dad on your special day.

Man Overboard - "She's Got Her Own Man Now" With its driving rhythm and sing-along chorus, this fun pop punk track celebrates a father watching his daughter find her own path in life and love.

Green Day - "When It's Time" Leave it to the punk rock kings to perfectly capture the bittersweet feelings of walking your daughter down the aisle with honest, poignant lyrics.

Blink-182 - "Going Away to College" Though about a daughter leaving for college, this classic Blink song's upbeat melody and lyrics about cherishing time together ring true for dads and daughters on her wedding day.

Pop punk mother-son wedding songs

"I Don't Want to Miss a Thing" by New Found Glory (Cover): Originally by Aerosmith, New Found Glory's cover gives this classic ballad a pop punk twist while still retaining its romantic sentiment.

"Thank You Mom" by Good Charlotte: This song is a heartfelt tribute to mothers, expressing gratitude and love, making it ideal for a mother-son dance moment.

"Time of Your Life" by Green Day: This song's acoustic sound and reflective lyrics make it a great choice for a tender moment between a mother and her son.

"You're Gonna Miss It All" by Modern Baseball: This song captures the bittersweet essence of growing up and moving on, making it a poignant choice for a mother-son dance that marks a transition in life.

Pop Punk songs Finale for the last wedding dance:

End the night on a high note with these pop-punk songs for your last wedding dance

- "Ocean Avenue" - Yellowcard

- "Dammit" - Blink-182

- "All Signs Point to Lauderdale" - A Day to Remember

- "My Own Worst Enemy" - Lit

- "The Rock Show" - Blink-182

Listen to these pop-punk songs for the last toast at your wedding

As the night winds down, you'll want more sentimental yet still energetic pop-punk ballads for the last toast to the newlyweds. Songs like...

"Time to Dance" by Panic! At The Disco celebrates love and making memories.

"The Sharpest Lives" by My Chemical Romance

"Champagne for My Real Friends..." by Fall Out Boy also have that bittersweet, end-of-the-night feel.

End Your Farewell Exit with these Pop Punk wedding song tracks

After the reception winds down, you'll want upbeat yet sentimental pop-punk songs that capture that bittersweet farewell feeling as the couple exits. Nostalgic hits like...

"Goodbye" by Avril Lavigne,

"After Midnight" by Blink-182: For that emotional late-night send-off, this Blink classic's lyrics about making everlasting memories hit home.

"Good Riddance (Time of Your Life)" by Green Day: The quintessential pop-punk farewell anthem, perfect for seeing the newlyweds off

"Longview" by Green Day:An upbeat yet reflective track celebrating new chapters in life.

As you immerse yourself in the world of Pop Punk Wedding Songs, we trust this playlist guide has fueled your quest for the perfect soundtrack. Whether you're drawn to energetic preludes, rebellious finales, or anything in between, these tunes promise an unforgettable celebration.

To elevate your celebration to unparalleled heights, why not consider the electrifying presence of a live Pop Punk Wedding Band? Experience the thrill, spontaneity, and unique vibe they bring, taking your event from ordinary to extraordinary. For a curated selection of top-notch bands, explore our Pop Punk Wedding Bands.
